publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-487 Patrick Harvie: Scotland Still Opposed to GM Crops—That the Parliament notes with concern reports that UK Government ministers are intent on backing genetically modified crops to be grown throughout the United Kingdom and calls on the Scottish Government to reassert its position that Scotland is a GM-free country and to inform the Westminster Government that GM crops will be opposed by the Scottish Government. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Brian Adam*
S3M-487 Scotland Still Opposed to GM Crops (lodged on 17 September 2007) Dave Thompson*, Robin Harper*

S3M-487 Patrick Harvie: Scotland Still Opposed to GM Crops—That the Parliament notes with concern reports that UK Government ministers are intent on backing genetically modified crops to be grown throughout the United Kingdom and calls on the Scottish Government to reassert its position that Scotland is a GM-free country and to inform the Westminster Government that GM crops will be opposed by the Scottish Government. Supported by: Stuart McMillan, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Brian Adam, Dave Thompson, Robin Harper
S3M-487 Scotland Still Opposed to GM Crops (lodged on 17 September 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-487 Scotland Still Opposed to GM Crops (lodged on 17 September 2007) Gil Paterson*
